name: SpikeCanvas: An IoT-Based Control Plane for Event-Driven Workflow Orchestration of  High-Density Neurophysiology Data
citation: Geng, Jinghui (2026) SpikeCanvas: An IoT-Based Control Plane for Event-Driven Workflow Orchestration of  High-Density Neurophysiology Data (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001747/draft
